I was planning on starting this topic Sunday, but I changed my mind.
Here is a complete list of all character types in the game:

Soldier
Barbarian
Elf
Archer
Mage
Archmage
Cleric
Thief
Druid
Orc
Orc Captain
Fire Elemental
Skeleton
Ghost
Faerie
Slime
Golem
Giant Skeleton
Tower

Are there any of these characters they do not need to be changed 
except for their behavior?  Just the names please.

Based on answers, I am going to start a topic and SLOWLY work our 
through the list of characters and ways we want to change them.

To do this discussion, I feel the need to be put characters in 
categories:

Perfect Characters
  ones that don't need to be changed and don't fall into another 
category

Imperfect Characters
  ones that do need to be changed and don't fall into another category

Promoted Characters
   Orc Captain
   Archmage

Summoned Characters
   Fire Elemental
   Faerie
   Ghost
   Skeleton

Special Characters
   Tower
   Golem
   Giant Skeleton

Hybrid/Dual Class
  Yep, we are going to have another discussion about this category.  I 
have some interesting ideas to share.

* * *

I will be taking notes to save in a text file.

I have some theories about how we might be able to 'improve' the game 
besides creating new scenarios and a new scenario editor.
